mapper.select:
select
from ci_pipe_step_deploy_instance i left join ci_pipe_step_deploy d on d.id=i.deploy_id where d.pipe_id = #{pipeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into ci_pipe_step_deploy_instance (id, deployId, instance_id) VALUES
(#{pipelineInstance.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pipelineInstance.deployId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pipelineInstance.instanceId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into ci_pipe_step_deploy_instance
id,
deploy_id,
instance_id,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update ci_pipe_step_deploy_instance
deploy_id = #{deployId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
instance_id = #{instanceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
